intro.wizard-button: Click this button to add a new transaction to your schedule.

date.default: Choose a date. For one-off transaction, this is the date when it will be simulated. For recurring transactions, you will define the schedule on the next step.

schedule.default: Now choose a schedule. Select the last option to run this transaction only once, or choose a once every week, once a month, or once a year schedule

holidayrule.default: If it's a bank holiday, when should proximo simulate it? For example, wage sometimes is deposited before the holiday, an AHC payment is executed after the holiday. A credit card transaction would happen on the same day.

daterange.default: Choose if you want to limit the start or end date when the schedule is effective.

parameters.default: On this screen you set all the basic parameters of this transaction: its amount, account, and description. Transfers between your own accounts require setting source and target accounts. Put My account for account name for the sake of this walkthrough.
